General.Name: Y.U.D. Yangtze River Investment Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Y.U.D.Yangtze River Investment Industry Co.,Ltd. provides logistics services in China. It engages in industrial investment, domestic trade, information consulting service, real estate development and operation, warehousing, and property management businesses, as well as sea, air, and land international freight forwarding business. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.
